generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with trees.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the left side of the road, including modern and classical architectural styles.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are present along both sides of the road, particularly dense on the right side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy and between buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and one is visible in the foreground, indicating active traffic.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the middle distance.
- pole: Several poles, likely for streetlights or traffic signals, are visible along the road, especially on the left side.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
